title: Zoku Attacker You! Kin Medal e no Michi
original_name: 続・アタッカーYOU 金メダルへの道
sinopse: Young and ambitious girls strive to do their very best to become NO.1 team in the sport world of volleyball. Outside the court, they face the problem of termination if they don’t win along with family, love and friendship dilemmas.
